Dining Hall FAQs 
















            Food Allergies, Religious & Other Special Dietary Needs          
R&DE Stanford Dining's nutritionists are available to provide support and help you navigate your dietary needs on campus.
 More










            Meet Our Chefs          
Get to know the talented culinary team of R&DE Stanford Dining who are dedicated to inspiring students with new flavors, enticing recipes and expertly crafted dishes.
 More










            Prioritizing Diversity, Equity, Inclusion & Belonging          
In support of R&DE's core value to Value & Embrace Diversity, Equity, Inclusion & Belonging, we prioritize many DEIB initiatives throughout Stanford Dining.
 More





 



R&DE Stanford Dining News & Events




February 1, 2023R&DE Stanford Dining has exciting events in the month of February. View our calendar. 





February 21, 2023Lakeside Dining Hall will serve a special dinner to celebrate Mardi Gras on Tuesday, February 21, 2023. View Menu. 





February 28, 2023Lakeside Dining Hall will serve special dinners to celebrate Black History Month on Tuesdays in February. View Menu. 





 


More News & Events 














Embedded video 

Stanford Dining Testimonial Spotlight Hear from our culinary team about why they are so committed to creating an innovative food program to fuel students for today and the future. 











            A Message to Students from R&DE Stanford Dining          
A note from the Assistant Vice Provost on our continued meal services for students.
 More 












            Student Engagement          
R&DE Stanford Dining invites students to explore opportunities to get involved with us!
 More 












            The Stanford Food Institute is creating a better food future!          
R&DE founded the Stanford Food Institute to work collaboratively with all 7 schools across the university to support food education, research, and flavor & innovation.
 More 












            Menus of Change University Research Collaborative          
R&DE co-founded and co-leads the Menus of Change University Research Collaborative (MCURC), a nationwide network of colleges and universities working to cultivate the long-term well-being of all people and the planet—one student, one meal at a time.
 More 












            See what's cooking in R&DE Stanford Dining
